trans-unit.source: Contains options that specify whether the persistence provider should keep or delete the state information for an instance in the persistence store after the instance completes.

[!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] ships with a SQL persistence provider as a constituent of the SQL Workflow Instance Store, which is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceStore> class and is used to persist state information in to the SQL Server database.

When the `InstanceComplectionAction` attribute is set to DeleteNothing for the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore> service behavior associated with a service, the SQL persistence provider keeps the instance state information for the instance in the SQL Server persistence database even after the instance completes, and when the `InstanceComplectionAction` attribute is set to DeleteAll (which is the default value), the persistence provider deletes all the instance state information when the instance completes.
Specifies that data and metadata for a workflow instance must be deleted from the persistence store after the workflow instance completes.
Specifies that data and metadata for a workflow instance must be kept in the persistence database even after the workflow instance completes.
